description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `name` in method `Spryker\Client\Messenger\Dependency\Client\MessengerToSessionClientBridge::getBag()`.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getBag()`. Got `$name` but expected to be `string $name`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
